summary.span: 正则表达式模式匹配方法的执行时间超出其超时时间间隔时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the execution time of a regular expression pattern-matching method exceeds its time-out interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出现 异常通常表明存在下列情况之一：The presence of a exception generally indicates one of the following conditions: - 正则表达式引擎尝试将输入文本与正则表达式模式匹配时，会过度进行回溯。The regular expression engine is backtracking excessively as it attempts to match the input text to the regular expression pattern. - 超时间隔设置得太低，特别是对于高计算机负载。The time-out interval has been set too low, especially given high machine load. 异常处理程序处理异常的方式取决于异常的原因：The way in which an exception handler handles an exception depends on the cause of the exception: - 如果超时导致过多回溯，则异常处理程序应放弃与输入的尝试匹配，并通知用户在正则表达式模式匹配方法中发生了超时。If the time-out results from excessive backtracking, your exception handler should abandon the attempt to match the input and inform the user that a time-out has occurred in the regular expression pattern-matching method. 如果可能，应记录有关正则表达式模式的信息，该模式可从属性获取， 而导致过多回溯的输入（可从 属性获取）应进行记录，以便能够调查问题并修改正则表达式模式。If possible, information about the regular expression pattern, which is available from the property, and the input that caused excessive backtracking, which is available from the property, should be logged so that the issue can be investigated and the regular expression pattern modified. 由于回溯过多，超时始终是可重复的。Time-outs due to excessive backtracking are always reproducible. - 如果将超时阈值设置得太低，则可以增加超时间隔，然后重试匹配操作。If the time-out results from setting the time-out threshold too low, you can increase the time-out interval and retry the matching operation. 当前超时间隔可从 属性获取。The current time-out interval is available from the property. 当 引发异常时，正则表达式引擎将保留其状态，以便以后的任何调用返回相同的结果，就好像未发生异常一样。When a exception is thrown, the regular expression engine maintains its state so that any future invocations return the same result, as if the exception did not occur. 建议的模式是在引发异常之后等待短暂的随机时间间隔，然后再次调用匹配方法。The recommended pattern is to wait for a brief, random time interval after the exception is thrown before calling the matching method again. 这可以重复多次。This can be repeated several times. 但是，重复次数应为小，以防过度回溯导致超时。However, the number of repetitions should be small in case the time-out is caused by excessive backtracking. 下一节中的示例说明了用于处理的这两种方法 。The example in the next section illustrates both techniques for handling a . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了两种处理异常的可能方法 。The following example illustrates two possible approaches to handling the exception. 一个常数，其值为2秒，用于定义最大超时间隔。A constant whose value is two seconds defines the maximum time-out interval. 最初使用一秒的超时间隔调用方法。The method is initially called with a time-out interval of one second. 每个 异常导致超时间隔增加一秒， 如果当前超时间隔小于最大超时间隔，则会导致另一次调用方法。Each exception causes the time-out interval to be increased by one second and results in another call to the method if the current time-out interval is less than the maximum time-out interval. 但是，如果当前超时间隔超出最大超时间隔，异常处理程序会将信息写入事件日志，并放弃正则表达式的处理。However, if the current time-out interval exceeds the maximum time-out interval, the exception handler writes information to the event log and abandons the processing of the regular expression. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexmatchtimeoutexception/cs/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexmatchtimeoutexception/vb/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用由系统提供的消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是类的无参数构造函数 。This is the parameterless constructor of the class. 此构造函数将新实例的 属性初始化为系统提供的错误描述消息。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error. 此消息针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。This message is localized for the current system culture.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: A string that describes the exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的消息字符串初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified message string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 `message` 字符串分配给 属性。The `message` string is assigned to the property. 应为当前区域性对字符串进行本地化。The string should be localized for the current culture.

summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不由您的代码直接调用来实例化 对象。This constructor is not called directly by your code to instantiate the object. 相反，它 在 从流中反序列化对象时由方法调用。Instead, it is called by the method when deserializing the object from a stream.

The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，使用此重载来处理块中的异常 `try/catch` 。Typically, you use this overload to handle an exception in a `try/catch` block. `innerException`参数应是对在块中处理的异常对象的引用 `catch` ，也可以是 `null` 。The `innerException` parameter should be a reference to the exception object handled in the `catch` block, or it can be `null`. 然后，将此值分配给 对象的 属性。This value is then assigned to the object's property. 将 `message` 字符串分配给 属性。The `message` string is assigned to the property. 应为当前区域性对字符串进行本地化。The string should be localized for the current culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `regexInput`、 `regexPattern` 和 `matchTimeout` 值被分配给 新对象的、 和 属性 。The `regexInput`, `regexPattern`, and `matchTimeout` values are assigned to the , , and properties of the new object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Input As String
public: property System::String ^ Input { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取超时发生时正则表达式引擎正在处理的输入文本。

span.span: Gets the input text that the regular expression engine was processing when the time-out occurred.
The regular expression input text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性反映 `regexInput` 构造函数的参数的值 。This property reflects the value of the `regexInput` parameter of the constructor. 如果未在构造函数调用中显式初始化此参数，则其值为 。If this parameter is not explicitly initialized in a constructor call, its value is . 当正则表达式引擎引发异常时，属性的值 反映传递到正则表达式引擎的整个输入字符串。When the exception is thrown by the regular expression engine, the value of the property reflects the entire input string passed to the regular expression engine. 它不反映部分字符串（例如，引擎在调用等方法的调用中搜索的子字符串） 。It does not reflect a partial string, such as the substring that the engine searches in the call to a method such as .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MatchTimeout As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan MatchTimeout { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 获取正则表达式匹配的超时间隔。

span.span: Gets the time-out interval for a regular expression match.
The time-out interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性反映 `matchTimeout` 构造函数的参数的值 。This property reflects the value of the `matchTimeout` parameter of the constructor. 如果未在构造函数调用中正确初始化参数，则其值为 `Timespan.FromTicks(-1)` 。If the parameter is not properly initialized in a constructor call, its value is `Timespan.FromTicks(-1)`. 此属性的值反映在对 构造函数或静态方法的调用中设置的超时间隔。The value of this property reflects the time-out interval set in the call to the constructor or static method. 它不反映从方法调用开始到引发异常时所经过的确切时间间隔。It does not reflect the exact interval that has elapsed from the beginning of the method call to the time the exception is thrown.

span.span: Populates a object with the data needed to serialize a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为接口对象时使用 。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface object. 格式化程序自动跟踪并序列化对象中包含的任何对象。Any objects that are included in the object are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
